story.text: NEW YORK Photography company Eastman Kodak Co. EK.N said on Wednesday that it entered into a cross-license agreement with Sony Corp. (6758.T) that will give the companies access to each other's patents. The companies agreed to conclude their patent litigation, which involved imaging technologies, Kodak said. Kodak also said it agreed on a cross license with handset maker Sony Ericsson Mobile Communications AB. The agreements are royalty bearing, it said, but did not disclose further financial terms of the deals.
story.title: kodak says in license agreement with sony
